title: Leave buster and /remake
body:
I have an unstable internet connection and sometimes in the loading screen I DC, so what i'd use to do I'd restart my net open league and get back into the game, But now because of /remake i dc try to come back but cant because I didn't connect to the match fast enough , So I receive LEAVE BUSTER, wait times Currently at 20 minuets before I can actually Q.

I don't have as much time to play league of legends as I use to and the 20 miuets I have to wait seriously effects my game time which is a shame because I really love playing.

replies.body:
Others really love to play as well, and when you disconnect, it leaves them a person behind and at a disadvantage. This is a reason why the Leaverbuster system treats all disconnections equally, regardless of the reason the disconnection happens. It's also a reason why we cannot modify or remove any penalties related to Leaverbuster. 

I recommend working through our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address your unstable connection so we can get you back on the rift quickly and effectively. Let me know if you have any questions.
yeah that's fair, just can be really annoying for me sometimes :/ ty for the reply

I think this remake system is completely out of control, I was just in came that i came back into 3 minute after going to use the washroom and I was given a low priority queue for 20 minutes for 5 games. This is an outrage i have to wait 20 minutes for each games (5 games = 1 hour and 40 minutes) because i needed to use the washroom and i was going to get to my own lane 3 minutes late? and this away from the worst part where people bug splat have to re log and join back(takes more than 3 minutes) and get low priority again for a bug in your game. Why are others being punished for there being a bug? I'd like a response from a riot member
maybe make remake like 4 or 5 minutes, I don't know i just knowing 3 minutes to get to my own lane. isn't something i should get punished for like its my lane and 3 minute isn't alot
